testCaseName: Verify Navigation in the About section
objective: Login and navigate to each tab in 'About' Module
preconditions: A valid user name and password combination

aboutSectionAlreadyOpen.description: About section is already open before navigation begins.
aboutSectionAlreadyOpen.expectedBehavior: Tabs should still be navigable and About section can be closed.

rapidTabSwitching.expectedBehavior: Application should not crash and all tabs should load correctly.

closeAboutSection.description: User closes the About section after navigation.
closeAboutSection.expectedBehavior: About section closes successfully and user returns to previous state.
